dev_description_en: Jokes that are surreal, bizarre, or intentionally absurd.
Jokes involving animals.
Jokes about Christmas and the holiday season.
Jokes about culture and cultural differences.
Jokes that are so bad, they're good.
Jokes that are dark, offensive, and often demeaning.
Jokes that require a certain level of intelligence or knowledge to understand.
Jokes that follow the knock-knock format.
Jokes about movies, actors and the film industry.
Jokes about music, musicians and the music industry.
Jokes that are short and to the point.
Jokes about programming and programming languages.
Jokes that are puns, or play on words.
Jokes about specific regions of the world.
Jokes that are sarcastic or ironic.
Jokes about ghosts, ghouls, and the halloween season.
Jokes about sports and athletes.
Jokes about technology and the tech industry.
Jokes about video games and the gaming industry.
Jokes that don't really fit into any other category.
